title: Why am I still level 4
body:
I know this sounds a bit grouchy. But it's been 3 months since I first tried to log on to boards, and I'M STILL LEVEL 4.

Am I missing something? Isn't the levels on boards suppose to be synced with your level in game?

I've been level 30 for almost a year already. 

Please help, thank you.

replies.body: Sync issues probably with Riot's forum software. I wouldn't worry too much about it. It's just a bonus feature to show what level you are in the game. If anything, something like this would be updated in the future passively, without a support request on the forums. I'm sure they're aware of this already.
Because you are perfect.  If you aren't from the boards than you probably don't understand that 4 joke.
